title: I don't see a link/game details to join in the confirmation? : BookMyShow Support Centre
body:
You have nothing to worry about! In this case you can expect another SMS/Email with the joining details, this is usually sent closer to the event.
For “Watch On BookMyShow” events, you can simply click on the “Join From Here” tab visible under 'Your Orders'.
Please keep an eye on your WhatsApp! For certain events/games, the joining details are sent by the organisers closer to the event.
You may initiate a LIVE CHAT, in case of any help.
